FuncDef:
The local-backup enable command enables local user information backup in a domain.
The undo local-backup enable command disables local user information backup in a domain.
By default, local user information backup is enabled in a domain.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a user is logged out unexpectedly, a device does not detect this event if the user's backup information is not saved. After the user's backup information is saved, the user can go online through IP/ARP triggering. If local user information backup in a domain is not required, run the undo local-backup enable command to disable local user information backup in the domain.
Prerequisites
The local-backup enable command has been run in the system view if you want to enable local user information backup in a domain.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
